head.supplied: 16/8/82 ¶ ¶ If it could be found out, dear Mr Ramsay, by sending me a specimen of the plant, from what source the resin on the Lachlan River ¶ is derived, I would send the sample, kindly forwarded b...

div.p: ML MSS.562, Letters to E. P. Ramsay 1862-91, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
If it could be found out, dear Mr Ramsay, by sending me a specimen of the plant, from what source the resin on the Lachlan River
NSW. See M to E. Ramsay, 30 August 1882. is derived, I would send the sample, kindly forwarded by you, to the Amsterdam Exhibition
Internationale Koloniale en Uitvoerhandel Tentoonstelling [International Colonial and Foreign Trade Exhibition], Amsterdam, 1883. with some other things intended for that place soon (next month) Possibly the resin was got under ground.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
